title: American-style fried chicken with white gravy
ingredients: ['125ml milk', '1 egg, beaten', '125g plain flour', '2 teaspoons garlic salt', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon chicken seasoning', '1 (1.8kg) whole chicken, cut into pieces', '750ml vegetable oil', '250ml chicken stock', '250ml milk']
